sub_title: English Language Instructor at Get Talking English!
summary:
I'm an English Language Teacher with a special focus on developing the potential in young learners from all backgrounds and levels, from the 3 year old who cannot yet read or write, to the teenager who is preparing for an important English exam. I also offer general English support for adult English language learners.

- I believe that every child is unique, and each child learns in a different way. Children don’t fit into one ‘box’.
- My aim is to bring out potential the child may not  even realise they have.
- It is possible for all kids to ‘Get Talking English’. (This applies of course to adults as well!)
-I believe in the principle of the Multiple Intelligence Theory, which acknowledges that children learn in a variety of ways, and I adapt my approach accordingly. So, when one method isn’t working well, I introduce other methods to enhance language learning. 

My materials include:
- Course books
- Authentic learning books from British cirricuculae
- Drama
- Games 
- Colouring, drawing and craft activities
- Multimedia 

I offer:
- One to one lessons
- Small group lessons (2 - 4 pupils)
- Literacy Support
- Homework support plus help with understanding English courses within the Dutch school system
- Conversation classes for adults
- One to one lessons and small group lessons for adults (can be targeted to specific needs)

For more information, please feel free to contact me on: 


Phone: 06-483 868 41
Email: amandapaulvoorschoten@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/englishgettalking/
